items.title: Burger King's Next Whopper Could Be Your Idea
items.description: Other restaurant chains have also been focused on incorporating customer feedback into menu offerings.

items.title: Snack Wrap redux: How McD's is refreshing its menu to lure back customers
items.description: McDonald's is reviving its long-lamented Snack Wrap and leaning into affordable eats as it looks to reverse a rare sales slump.
